_sText:
A 2:20-2:30 long (if you're going fast) strafe map. I got bored and wanted to make a bit of a longer map so I spent a few days working on this, it's pretty straight forward and has a big block style, the map is easy to beat in general but hard to do fast. I intended for it to be a one shot map, but decided to add a few checkpoints here and there because I knew some people would complain.  

The bonus was originally made by Dream for a surf project of mine, it was then modified by ArcticPanda and finally changed slightly by me.  

Map should be doable on all styles, just keep in mind the map is intended to be ran with a lot of speed so if you keep failing you might find yourself pre-speeding a lot.
